node.title: The Most Important Question
node.description: There are many questions we ask in the course of our life. Some are trivial – while others are life-changing. But the most important question is the question of our eternal destiny, and what we must do to be assured that Jesus is the Savior of our souls. In this study, Pastor Clark looks at two individuals who asked that question. The insights that prompted their query might well be instructive for ours as well!
